catalog_script_client.name: Update Subcategory

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_3d7899658778419005fd63583cbb3501
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Report Fraud">1d7859658778419005fd63583cbb3547</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e97859658778419005fd63583cbb35d1</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Update Subcategory</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   } 
	g_form.clearOptions('subcategory');
	g_form.addOption("subcategory", "", "-- None --");
	
	var category = g_form.getValue("category");
	if(category === "1") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 1, "Broken");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 2, "Does not work");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 3, "Unexpected behavior");
	}
	else if(category  ===  "2") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 4, "Did not meet expectation");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 5, "Difficult to use");
	}
	else if(category  ===  "3") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 6, "Poor support");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 7, "Long resolution time");
	}
	else if(category  ===  "4") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 8, "Higher cost than other providers");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 9, "Excessive fees");
	}
	else if(category  ===  "5") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 10, "Poor maintenance");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 11, "Insufficient inventory");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 12, "Outdated equipment");
	}
	else if(category  ===  "6") {
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 13, "Poor service");
		g_form.addOption("subcategory", 14, "Lack of knowledge");
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3d7899658778419005fd63583cbb3501</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Subcategory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unemployment application" source="x_snc_unemployment">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unemployment application">b348079cdb481850afe2ac4e13961971</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3d7899658778419005fd63583cbb3501</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-02 00:47:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
